Title: Tree Planting for Tomorrow
Description: A reforestation project to restore denuded hillsides and promote environmental sustainability in Balamban's highlands.

Title: Feeding Smiles Program
Description: Volunteer to prepare and distribute nutritious meals to underprivileged children while engaging them in fun learning activities.
Location: Barangay San Roque Gym, Talisay City, Cebu

Title: Coastal Cleanup Drive
Description: Join us in preserving the beauty of Mactan's beaches by helping clean up coastal areas and educating locals on proper waste disposal.

Title: River Rejuvenation Project
Description: Help clean selected sections of the Guadalupe River and conduct barangay awareness campaigns.

Title: Elderly Care Outreach
Description: Spend time with senior citizens, assist staff, and help organize recreational activities.
Location: Liloan Municipal Social Hall, Liloan, Cebu

Title: Community Gardening & Urban Farming Day
Description: Help create and maintain a small community vegetable garden for local residents.
Location: Barangay Tayud Community Garden, Consolacion, Cebu

Title: Youth Sports Volunteer Day
Description: Assist in organizing a youth sports event by helping with logistics, registration, and facilitation.
Location: Don Celestino Martinez Sports Complex, Bogo City, Cebu

Title: Animal Shelter Help Day
Description: Help clean cages, feed animals, and assist in adoption-day preparations.
Location: Talisay City Animal Rescue & Care Center, Talisay City, Cebu

Title: School Refurbishment Drive
Description: Help repaint classrooms, clean surroundings, and repair simple school furniture.
Location: Ibo Elementary School, Toledo City, Cebu

Title: Barangay Health Awareness Caravan
Description: Support the health office in distributing flyers, assisting in BP checks, and guiding participants.
Location: Barangay Tunghaan Covered Court, Minglanilla, Cebu
